title: Laptop specifications... I am buying a laptop these are the specs... Will it run league.
body:
Item Specification:
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
RAM: 4GB
HDD: 320GB
Operation System: Windows 7
Wireless: Yes
Optical Drive: DVD RW
USB: Yes 
Webcam: Yes
VGA: Yes
Condition: Good
Power Cable: Included

replies.body: It should run League, but depending on the GPU your performance may vary.  I'd recommend comparing your laptop specs vs. our listed [Minimum/Recommend Specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654). Lemme know if you find it useful :D
